code: function getCommonOptions(){var authToken=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('authToken'));if(!authToken){return{};}return{method:"GET",headers:{'Authorization':"token ".concat(authToken),'Content-Type':'application/json','Accept':'application/json'}};}export function saveToken(tokenDetails){localStorage.setItem('authToken',JSON.stringify(tokenDetails));}export function saveID(tokenDetails){localStorage.setItem('User_ID',JSON.stringify(tokenDetails));}export default getCommonOptions;
